api_list.name: request video formats
api_list.description:
filter can be : 
audioonly
videoonly
videoandaudio
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-downloader9.p.rapidapi.com/CiGnubZC5cs/videoandaudio"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-downloader9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-downloader9.p.rapidapi.com/{videoid}/{filter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-downloader9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
